beantype.name: org.rapidbeans.rapidenv.config.Download

property.name: osfamily
property.description: If this value is defined this check will become an operating system specific one. If it is undefined the definition is valid for all platforms without specific definition.

property.name: downloadtype
property.description: Describes the method how to download (automatic versus manual))

property.name: url
property.description: The URL where you can download the file.
